title: These $1 “Cherry Coasters” at Target Are So Adorable, I Bought 4 Packs

From the moment I started remixing ramen noodles into gourmet meals and spending hours watching cooking shows as a puny six-year-old, I knew I found a deep passion for food. While I realized — after taking on a two-year high school internship in an award-winning kitchen — that a…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

There are two types of people when it comes to seasonal merch: those who side-eye stores for rolling out holiday products too early and those who enjoy scooping up cute items well in advance. I personally belong to the latter group and don’t mind when brands release their collections ahead of time. Just a few days ago, while I was perusing around Target, I spotted the cutest kitchen gem for Valentine’s Day, and I couldn’t resist adding a few of them to my cart. 

The Dollar Spot section of Target has been dropping the most adorable gems lately. If you haven’t visited it in a while, you should take a trip there ASAP. It recently rolled out a gorgeous vintage-inspired set of overnight oat and acai bowls, and now it’s back with the most charming coasters. 

The coasters in question are crafted from a durable polystyrene material, so you don’t have to worry about them shattering if you accidentally drop them. The best part? They’re designed with a cute heart-shaped cherry pattern that’s very on trend with the coquette aesthetic taking over the latest dinnerware drops. One $1 pack comes with four 4-inch long and 4inch wide coasters.

One Instagram creator, @target_junkie, who posts about the latest finds at Target, shared a clip detailing these gems, and people could not stop waxing poetic about them. One person commented, “OK, I’m going over,” while another user said, “Cute finds.”

If you head to Target and have trouble spotting these cherry-shaped coasters, luckily, the coaster set comes in two other designs. The first is an adorable martini-inspired one with cute olives, and the second features a dainty bow on a light pink background. 

When you spot cute finds at Target’s Dollar Spot, it’s best to pick them up quickly. These gems are often limited edition, so they won’t last long on the shelves.

Buy: Cherry Printed Square Coasters, $12.59
